title: Interface coupling to improve O<sub>2</sub> adsorption and accelerate charge separation for boosting photocatalytic performance of ZnO/ZnIn<sub>2</sub>S<sub>4</sub> composite in H<sub>2</sub>O<sub>2</sub> production and environmental remediation
